import {} from "./schema";


================================================================================
FILE: drizzle/schema.ts
================================================================================

import { int, mysqlEnum, mysqlTable, text, timestamp, varchar, json, boolean } from "drizzle-orm/mysql-core";

/**
 * Core user table backing auth flow.
 * Extend this file with additional tables as your product grows.
 * Columns use camelCase to match both database fields and generated types.
 */
export const users = mysqlTable("users", {
  /**
   * Surrogate primary key. Auto-incremented numeric value managed by the database.
   * Use this for relations between tables.
   */
  id: int("id").autoincrement().primaryKey(),
  /** Manus OAuth identifier (openId) returned from the OAuth callback. Unique per user. */
  openId: varchar("openId", { length: 64 }).notNull().unique(),
  name: text("name"),
  email: varchar("email", { length: 320 }),
  loginMethod: varchar("loginMethod", { length: 64 }),
  role: mysqlEnum("role", ["user", "admin"]).default("user").notNull(),
  createdAt: timestamp("createdAt").defaultNow().notNull(),
  updatedAt: timestamp("updatedAt").defaultNow().onUpdateNow().notNull(),
  lastSignedIn: timestamp("lastSignedIn").defaultNow().notNull(),
});

export type User = typeof users.$inferSelect;
export type InsertUser = typeof users.$inferInsert;

// Conversations table for storing chat history
export const conversations = mysqlTable("conversations", {
  id: int("id").autoincrement().primaryKey(),
  userId: int("userId").notNull(),
  messages: text("messages").notNull(), // JSON string of messages array
  feature: mysqlEnum("feature", ["complaints", "legislative"]).notNull(),
  language: mysqlEnum("language", ["arabic", "english"]).notNull(),
  riskScore: int("riskScore"), // Extracted risk score for analytics (legacy)
  category: varchar("category", { length: 100 }), // Extracted category for analytics
  status: mysqlEnum("status", ["new", "under_review", "investigating", "resolved"]).default("new").notNull(),
  assignedTo: int("assignedTo"), // User ID of assigned reviewer
  // EREBUS Enhanced Fields (Acuterium Integration)
  advancedRiskScore: text("advancedRiskScore"), // JSON: EREBUSFORMULA651 full output
  protocolMetadata: text("protocolMetadata"), // JSON: Protocol execution details
  complianceFlags: text("complianceFlags"), // JSON: Detected compliance violations
  createdAt: timestamp("createdAt").defaultNow().notNull(),
  updatedAt: timestamp("updatedAt").defaultNow().onUpdateNow().notNull(),
});

export type Conversation = typeof conversations.$inferSelect;
export type InsertConversation = typeof conversations.$inferInsert;

// Status history table for tracking all status changes
export const statusHistory = mysqlTable("status_history", {
  id: int("id").autoincrement().primaryKey(),
  conversationId: int("conversationId").notNull(),
  previousStatus: mysqlEnum("previousStatus", ["new", "under_review", "investigating", "resolved"]),
  newStatus: mysqlEnum("newStatus", ["new", "under_review", "investigating", "resolved"]).notNull(),
  changedByUserId: int("changedByUserId").notNull(),
  changedByUserName: varchar("changedByUserName", { length: 200 }),
  notes: text("notes"), // Optional notes for the status change
  createdAt: timestamp("createdAt").defaultNow().notNull(),
});

export type StatusHistory = typeof statusHistory.$inferSelect;
export type InsertStatusHistory = typeof statusHistory.$inferInsert;

// Weekly reports table for scheduled reports
export const weeklyReports = mysqlTable("weekly_reports", {
  id: int("id").autoincrement().primaryKey(),
  weekStartDate: timestamp("weekStartDate").notNull(),
  weekEndDate: timestamp("weekEndDate").notNull(),
  totalComplaints: int("totalComplaints").notNull(),
  highRiskCount: int("highRiskCount").notNull(),
  resolvedCount: int("resolvedCount").notNull(),
  avgRiskScore: int("avgRiskScore").notNull(),
  categoryBreakdown: text("categoryBreakdown").notNull(), // JSON
  topEntities: text("topEntities").notNull(), // JSON
  recommendations: text("recommendations"), // JSON array
  generatedAt: timestamp("generatedAt").defaultNow().notNull(),
  emailedTo: text("emailedTo"), // JSON array of email addresses
});

export type WeeklyReport = typeof weeklyReports.$inferSelect;
export type InsertWeeklyReport = typeof weeklyReports.$inferInsert;

// Sample complaints table for demo (expanded)
export const sampleComplaints = mysqlTable("sample_complaints", {
  id: int("id").autoincrement().primaryKey(),
  textArabic: text("textArabic").notNull(),
  textEnglish: text("textEnglish").notNull(),
  category: varchar("category", { length: 100 }).notNull(),
  expectedRiskScore: int("expectedRiskScore").notNull(),
  ministry: varchar("ministry", { length: 200 }), // Which ministry/entity
  keywords: text("keywords"), // JSON array of keywords
  createdAt: timestamp("createdAt").defaultNow().notNull(),
});

export type SampleComplaint = typeof sampleComplaints.$inferSelect;
export type InsertSampleComplaint = typeof sampleComplaints.$inferInsert;

// Audit findings table for demo
export const auditFindings = mysqlTable("audit_findings", {
  id: int("id").autoincrement().primaryKey(),
  titleArabic: text("titleArabic").notNull(),
  titleEnglish: text("titleEnglish").notNull(),
  descriptionArabic: text("descriptionArabic").notNull(),
  descriptionEnglish: text("descriptionEnglish").notNull(),
  category: varchar("category", { length: 100 }).notNull(),
  severity: mysqlEnum("severity", ["critical", "high", "medium", "low"]).notNull(),
  ministry: varchar("ministry", { length: 200 }).notNull(),
  year: int("year").notNull(),
  amountOMR: int("amountOMR"), // Amount in Omani Rials if applicable
  status: mysqlEnum("status", ["open", "in_progress", "resolved", "closed"]).default("open").notNull(),
  createdAt: timestamp("createdAt").defaultNow().notNull(),
});

export type AuditFinding = typeof auditFindings.$inferSelect;
export type InsertAuditFinding = typeof auditFindings.$inferInsert;

// Legislative documents table for legal intelligence
export const legislativeDocuments = mysqlTable("legislative_documents", {
  id: int("id").autoincrement().primaryKey(),
  titleArabic: text("titleArabic").notNull(),
  titleEnglish: text("titleEnglish").notNull(),
  documentType: mysqlEnum("documentType", ["royal_decree", "ministerial_decision", "law", "regulation", "circular"]).notNull(),
  documentNumber: varchar("documentNumber", { length: 100 }).notNull(),
  year: int("year").notNull(),
  summaryArabic: text("summaryArabic"),
  summaryEnglish: text("summaryEnglish"),
  keyProvisions: text("keyProvisions"), // JSON array of key provisions
  relatedTo: text("relatedTo"), // JSON array of related document IDs
  isActive: int("isActive").default(1).notNull(),
  createdAt: timestamp("createdAt").defaultNow().notNull(),
});

export type LegislativeDocument = typeof legislativeDocuments.$inferSelect;
export type InsertLegislativeDocument = typeof legislativeDocuments.$inferInsert;

// Analytics events table for tracking usage
export const analyticsEvents = mysqlTable("analytics_events", {
  id: int("id").autoincrement().primaryKey(),
  userId: int("userId"),
  eventType: mysqlEnum("eventType", ["chat_message", "complaint_analyzed", "legislative_query", "pdf_export", "voice_input", "document_upload", "document_analysis", "complaint_submitted"]).notNull(),
  feature: mysqlEnum("feature", ["complaints", "legislative"]).notNull(),
  language: mysqlEnum("language", ["arabic", "english"]).notNull(),
  category: varchar("category", { length: 100 }),
  riskScore: int("riskScore"),
  metadata: text("metadata"), // JSON for additional data
  createdAt: timestamp("createdAt").defaultNow().notNull(),
});

export type AnalyticsEvent = typeof analyticsEvents.$inferSelect;
export type InsertAnalyticsEvent = typeof analyticsEvents.$inferInsert;

// Demo trends data for analytics charts
export const demoTrends = mysqlTable("demo_trends", {
  id: int("id").autoincrement().primaryKey(),
  date: timestamp("date").notNull(),
  totalComplaints: int("totalComplaints").notNull(),
  financialCorruption: int("financialCorruption").default(0).notNull(),
  conflictOfInterest: int("conflictOfInterest").default(0).notNull(),
  abuseOfPower: int("abuseOfPower").default(0).notNull(),
  tenderViolation: int("tenderViolation").default(0).notNull(),
  adminNeglect: int("adminNeglect").default(0).notNull(),
  generalComplaint: int("generalComplaint").default(0).notNull(),
  avgRiskScore: int("avgRiskScore").default(0).notNull(),
  createdAt: timestamp("createdAt").defaultNow().notNull(),
});

export type DemoTrend = typeof demoTrends.$inferSelect;
export type InsertDemoTrend = typeof demoTrends.$inferInsert;


// Historical OSAI statistics for comparative analysis (2021-2024)
export const historicalStats = mysqlTable("historical_stats", {
  id: int("id").autoincrement().primaryKey(),
  year: int("year").notNull(),
  metric: varchar("metric", { length: 100 }).notNull(),
  value: int("value"),
  valueDecimal: varchar("valueDecimal", { length: 50 }), // For decimal values like OMR millions
  unit: varchar("unit", { length: 50 }).notNull(),
  category: varchar("category", { length: 100 }), // Optional category grouping
  source: varchar("source", { length: 200 }), // Source document reference
  createdAt: timestamp("createdAt").defaultNow().notNull(),
});

export type HistoricalStat = typeof historicalStats.$inferSelect;
export type InsertHistoricalStat = typeof historicalStats.$inferInsert;

// Complaints by entity for year-over-year comparison
export const historicalComplaintsByEntity = mysqlTable("historical_complaints_by_entity", {
  id: int("id").autoincrement().primaryKey(),
  year: int("year").notNull(),
  entityNameArabic: varchar("entityNameArabic", { length: 300 }),
  entityNameEnglish: varchar("entityNameEnglish", { length: 300 }).notNull(),
  complaintCount: int("complaintCount").notNull(),
  resolvedCount: int("resolvedCount"),
  avgResolutionDays: int("avgResolutionDays"),
  createdAt: timestamp("createdAt").defaultNow().notNull(),
});

export type HistoricalComplaintsByEntity = typeof historicalComplaintsByEntity.$inferSelect;
export type InsertHistoricalComplaintsByEntity = typeof historicalComplaintsByEntity.$inferInsert;

// Complaints by category for year-over-year comparison
export const historicalComplaintsByCategory = mysqlTable("historical_complaints_by_category", {
  id: int("id").autoincrement().primaryKey(),
  year: int("year").notNull(),
  categoryArabic: varchar("categoryArabic", { length: 200 }),
  categoryEnglish: varchar("categoryEnglish", { length: 200 }).notNull(),
  complaintCount: int("complaintCount").notNull(),
  percentageOfTotal: int("percentageOfTotal"), // Stored as percentage * 100
  createdAt: timestamp("createdAt").defaultNow().notNull(),
});

export type HistoricalComplaintsByCategory = typeof historicalComplaintsByCategory.$inferSelect;
export type InsertHistoricalComplaintsByCategory = typeof historicalComplaintsByCategory.$inferInsert;

// Conviction examples for case studies
export const historicalConvictions = mysqlTable("historical_convictions", {
  id: int("id").autoincrement().primaryKey(),
  year: int("year").notNull(),
  entityNameArabic: varchar("entityNameArabic", { length: 300 }),
  entityNameEnglish: varchar("entityNameEnglish", { length: 300 }).notNull(),
  position: varchar("position", { length: 200 }),
  violationType: varchar("violationType", { length: 300 }).notNull(),
  sentenceYears: int("sentenceYears"),
  sentenceMonths: int("sentenceMonths"),
  fineOMR: int("fineOMR"),
  amountInvolved: int("amountInvolved"), // Amount embezzled/involved
  additionalPenalties: text("additionalPenalties"), // JSON array
  summaryArabic: text("summaryArabic"),
  summaryEnglish: text("summaryEnglish"),
  createdAt: timestamp("createdAt").defaultNow().notNull(),
});

export type HistoricalConviction = typeof historicalConvictions.$inferSelect;
export type InsertHistoricalConviction = typeof historicalConvictions.$inferInsert;


// Case law database for searchable archive of OSAI convictions
export const caseLaw = mysqlTable("case_law", {
  id: int("id").autoincrement().primaryKey(),
  caseNumber: varchar("caseNumber", { length: 50 }),
  year: int("year").notNull(),
  entityNameArabic: varchar("entityNameArabic", { length: 300 }),
  entityNameEnglish: varchar("entityNameEnglish", { length: 300 }).notNull(),
  entityType: mysqlEnum("entityType", ["ministry", "government_company", "municipality", "public_authority", "other"]).default("other"),
  violationType: mysqlEnum("violationType", ["embezzlement", "bribery", "conflict_of_interest", "abuse_of_power", "forgery", "tender_violation", "administrative_negligence", "other"]).notNull(),
  violationTypeArabic: varchar("violationTypeArabic", { length: 200 }),
  violationTypeEnglish: varchar("violationTypeEnglish", { length: 200 }),
  accusedPosition: varchar("accusedPosition", { length: 200 }),
  accusedPositionArabic: varchar("accusedPositionArabic", { length: 200 }),
  legalArticles: text("legalArticles"), // JSON array of relevant articles
  sentenceYears: int("sentenceYears"),
  sentenceMonths: int("sentenceMonths"),
  fineOMR: int("fineOMR"),
  amountInvolved: int("amountInvolved"),
  amountRecovered: int("amountRecovered"),
  additionalPenalties: text("additionalPenalties"), // JSON array (dismissal, travel ban, etc.)
  summaryArabic: text("summaryArabic"),
  summaryEnglish: text("summaryEnglish"),
  detailsArabic: text("detailsArabic"),
  detailsEnglish: text("detailsEnglish"),
  outcome: mysqlEnum("outcome", ["convicted", "acquitted", "pending", "settled"]).default("convicted"),
  sourceReport: varchar("sourceReport", { length: 100 }), // e.g., "Annual Report 2024"
  createdAt: timestamp("createdAt").defaultNow().notNull(),
});

export type CaseLaw = typeof caseLaw.$inferSelect;
export type InsertCaseLaw = typeof caseLaw.$inferInsert;


// Knowledge Base - Stores ingested document content for AI retrieval
// Schema aligned with server/db/knowledge.ts module
export const knowledgeBase = mysqlTable("knowledge_base", {
  id: int("id").autoincrement().primaryKey(),
  // Core content fields (matching KnowledgeEntry interface)
  title: varchar("title", { length: 500 }).notNull(),
  titleArabic: varchar("titleArabic", { length: 500 }),
  content: text("content").notNull(),
  contentArabic: text("contentArabic"),
  category: mysqlEnum("category", [
    "law",
    "regulation", 
    "policy", 
    "procedure",
    "report",
    "guideline"
  ]).notNull(),
  source: varchar("source", { length: 500 }).notNull(),
  referenceNumber: varchar("referenceNumber", { length: 100 }),
  keywords: text("keywords"), // JSON array of keywords for search
  keywordsArabic: text("keywordsArabic"), // JSON array of Arabic keywords
  effectiveDate: timestamp("effectiveDate"),
  createdAt: timestamp("createdAt").defaultNow().notNull(),
  updatedAt: timestamp("updatedAt").defaultNow().onUpdateNow().notNull(),
});

export type KnowledgeBase = typeof knowledgeBase.$inferSelect;
export type InsertKnowledgeBase = typeof knowledgeBase.$inferInsert;

// Document version history - tracks all changes to documents
// Schema aligned with server/db/knowledge.ts DocumentVersion interface
export const documentVersions = mysqlTable("document_versions", {
  id: int("id").autoincrement().primaryKey(),
  knowledgeId: int("knowledgeId").notNull(), // Reference to knowledge_base.id
  version: int("version").notNull(),
  content: text("content").notNull(), // Snapshot of content at this version
  contentArabic: text("contentArabic"), // Snapshot of Arabic content
  changedBy: varchar("changedBy", { length: 200 }).notNull(), // User who made the change
  changeDescription: text("changeDescription").notNull(), // Description of what changed
  createdAt: timestamp("createdAt").defaultNow().notNull(),
});

export type DocumentVersion = typeof documentVersions.$inferSelect;
export type InsertDocumentVersion = typeof documentVersions.$inferInsert;


// User Documents - Secure storage for user-uploaded documents
// Each user can only access their own documents
export const userDocuments = mysqlTable("user_documents", {
  id: int("id").autoincrement().primaryKey(),
  userId: int("userId").notNull(), // Owner of the document
  
  // Document metadata
  title: varchar("title", { length: 500 }).notNull(),
  titleArabic: varchar("titleArabic", { length: 500 }),
  description: text("description"),
  descriptionArabic: text("descriptionArabic"),
  
  // File information
  fileName: varchar("fileName", { length: 255 }).notNull(),
  fileType: mysqlEnum("fileType", ["pdf", "doc", "docx", "txt", "image"]).notNull(),
  fileSize: int("fileSize").notNull(), // Size in bytes
  fileUrl: varchar("fileUrl", { length: 1000 }).notNull(), // S3 URL
  fileKey: varchar("fileKey", { length: 500 }).notNull(), // S3 key for deletion
  
  // Content (extracted from PDF/text files)
  extractedContent: text("extractedContent"),
  extractedContentArabic: text("extractedContentArabic"),
  
  // Classification
  category: mysqlEnum("category", [
    "complaint",
    "evidence",
    "legal_document",
    "report",
    "correspondence",
    "other"
  ]).default("other").notNull(),
  
  // Tags for organization
  tags: text("tags"), // JSON array of tags
  
  // Access control
  isPrivate: boolean("isPrivate").default(true).notNull(), // Private by default
  sharedWith: text("sharedWith"), // JSON array of user IDs who can access
  
  // Timestamps
  createdAt: timestamp("createdAt").defaultNow().notNull(),
  updatedAt: timestamp("updatedAt").defaultNow().onUpdateNow().notNull(),
});

export type UserDocument = typeof userDocuments.$inferSelect;
export type InsertUserDocument = typeof userDocuments.$inferInsert;


// =============================================================================
// EREBUS PROTOCOL TABLES (Acuterium Technologies Integration)
// =============================================================================

// Protocol Audit Trail - Tracks all EREBUS protocol executions
export const protocolAuditTrail = mysqlTable("protocol_audit_trail", {
  id: int("id").autoincrement().primaryKey(),
  conversationId: int("conversationId"),
  protocolId: varchar("protocolId", { length: 50 }).notNull(),
  protocolName: varchar("protocolName", { length: 200 }).notNull(),
  formula: varchar("formula", { length: 50 }).notNull(),
  inputHash: varchar("inputHash", { length: 64 }).notNull(),
  outputHash: varchar("outputHash", { length: 64 }).notNull(),
  executionTimeMs: int("executionTimeMs").notNull(),
  consciousnessCoherence: varchar("consciousnessCoherence", { length: 10 }),
  riskScore: int("riskScore"),
  riskCategory: mysqlEnum("riskCategory", ["CRITICAL", "HIGH", "MEDIUM", "LOW", "NEGLIGIBLE"]),
  detectedViolations: int("detectedViolations").default(0),
  metadata: text("metadata"),
  createdAt: timestamp("createdAt").defaultNow().notNull(),
});

export type ProtocolAuditTrail = typeof protocolAuditTrail.$inferSelect;
export type InsertProtocolAuditTrail = typeof protocolAuditTrail.$inferInsert;

// Entity Risk Assessments - EREBUSFORMULA656 results
export const entityRiskAssessments = mysqlTable("entity_risk_assessments", {
  id: int("id").autoincrement().primaryKey(),
  entityName: varchar("entityName", { length: 500 }).notNull(),
  entityNameArabic: varchar("entityNameArabic", { length: 500 }),
  entityType: mysqlEnum("entityType", ["ministry", "government_company", "public_authority", "private_company", "individual", "other"]).default("other"),
  registrationCountry: varchar("registrationCountry", { length: 3 }).default("OM"),
  
  // EREBUSFORMULA656 scores
  ER_entity: varchar("ER_entity", { length: 10 }),
  riskCategory: mysqlEnum("riskCategory", ["CRITICAL", "HIGH", "ELEVATED", "MEDIUM", "LOW"]),
  jurisdictionRisk: varchar("jurisdictionRisk", { length: 10 }),
  ownershipRisk: varchar("ownershipRisk", { length: 10 }),
  sanctionsRisk: varchar("sanctionsRisk", { length: 10 }),
  pepRisk: varchar("pepRisk", { length: 10 }),
  
  // Flags and due diligence
  flags: text("flags"),
  dueDiligenceLevel: mysqlEnum("dueDiligenceLevel", ["ENHANCED", "STANDARD", "SIMPLIFIED"]),
  
  // Metadata
  lastAssessedAt: timestamp("lastAssessedAt"),
  assessedByProtocol: varchar("assessedByProtocol", { length: 50 }),
  consciousnessCoherence: varchar("consciousnessCoherence", { length: 10 }),
  
  createdAt: timestamp("createdAt").defaultNow().notNull(),
  updatedAt: timestamp("updatedAt").defaultNow().onUpdateNow().notNull(),
});

export type EntityRiskAssessment = typeof entityRiskAssessments.$inferSelect;
export type InsertEntityRiskAssessment = typeof entityRiskAssessments.$inferInsert;

// Legal Searches - EREBUSFORMULA650 search history
export const legalSearches = mysqlTable("legal_searches", {
  id: int("id").autoincrement().primaryKey(),
  userId: int("userId"),
  query: text("query").notNull(),
  queryLanguage: mysqlEnum("queryLanguage", ["arabic", "english"]).default("english"),
  
  // Query analysis
  detectedJurisdiction: varchar("detectedJurisdiction", { length: 3 }),
  detectedTopics: text("detectedTopics"),
  queryComplexity: mysqlEnum("queryComplexity", ["SIMPLE", "MODERATE", "COMPLEX"]),
  
  // Results summary
  totalResults: int("totalResults").default(0),
  topResultRelevance: varchar("topResultRelevance", { length: 10 }),
  avgRelevance: varchar("avgRelevance", { length: 10 }),
  
  // Protocol metadata
  searchDurationMs: int("searchDurationMs"),
  protocolId: varchar("protocolId", { length: 50 }).default("EREBUS-CSE-3A12d-001"),
  consciousnessCoherence: varchar("consciousnessCoherence", { length: 10 }),
  
  // Results
  results: text("results"),
  
  createdAt: timestamp("createdAt").defaultNow().notNull(),
});

export type LegalSearch = typeof legalSearches.$inferSelect;
export type InsertLegalSearch = typeof legalSearches.$inferInsert;


// Access request system - for secure demo access control
export const accessRequests = mysqlTable("access_requests", {
  id: int("id").autoincrement().primaryKey(),
  email: varchar("email", { length: 320 }).notNull(),
  name: varchar("name", { length: 200 }).notNull(),
  organization: varchar("organization", { length: 300 }),
  reason: text("reason"),
  status: mysqlEnum("status", ["pending", "approved", "denied"]).default("pending").notNull(),
  reviewedBy: int("reviewedBy"), // Admin user ID who reviewed
  reviewedAt: timestamp("reviewedAt"),
  reviewNotes: text("reviewNotes"),
  createdAt: timestamp("createdAt").defaultNow().notNull(),
  updatedAt: timestamp("updatedAt").defaultNow().onUpdateNow().notNull(),
});

export type AccessRequest = typeof accessRequests.$inferSelect;
export type InsertAccessRequest = typeof accessRequests.$inferInsert;

// Temporary access codes - generated upon approval
export const accessCodes = mysqlTable("access_codes", {
  id: int("id").autoincrement().primaryKey(),
  code: varchar("code", { length: 20 }).notNull().unique(),
  requestId: int("requestId").notNull(), // Links to access_requests
  email: varchar("email", { length: 320 }).notNull(),
  expiresAt: timestamp("expiresAt").notNull(),
  usedAt: timestamp("usedAt"),
  isUsed: boolean("isUsed").default(false).notNull(),
  createdBy: int("createdBy"), // Admin user ID who generated
  createdAt: timestamp("createdAt").defaultNow().notNull(),
});

export type AccessCode = typeof accessCodes.$inferSelect;
export type InsertAccessCode = typeof accessCodes.$inferInsert;

# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
# RUZN-LITE KNOWLEDGE SOURCE REGISTRY TEMPLATE
# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
# Copy this file to sources.yaml and configure for your jurisdiction
# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

================================================================================
FILE: knowledge/scripts/ingest_pgvector.ts
================================================================================

/**
 * Ruzn-Lite PGVector Document Ingestion Script
 * 
 * Ingests PDF/DOCX documents into the pgvector knowledge base.
 * Supports both cloud (OpenAI) and local (sovereign) embeddings.
 * 
 * Usage:
 *   pnpm tsx knowledge/scripts/ingest_pgvector.ts
 *   # or
 *   pnpm knowledge:pgvector:ingest
 * 
 * Expected directory structure:
 *   knowledge/sources/oman/<sourceId>__<description>.pdf
 * 
 * Environment:
 *   - KNOWLEDGE_PGVECTOR_URL=postgres://...
 *   - EMBEDDINGS_BACKEND=openai|local
 *   - OPENAI_API_KEY (if using openai)
 *   - LOCAL_EMBEDDINGS_URL (if using local)
 *   - SOVEREIGN_MODE=true|false
 */

import fs from "fs";
import path from "path";
import { glob } from "glob";
import { Client } from "pg";
import { parse as parseYaml } from "yaml";
import { getEmbedder } from "../../server/knowledge/embeddings";

// â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
// CONFIGURATION
// â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

const KNOWLEDGE_DIR = path.join(process.cwd(), "knowledge");
const SOURCES_DIR = path.join(KNOWLEDGE_DIR, "sources");
const LINKS_FILE = path.join(KNOWLEDGE_DIR, "links", "oman_sources.yaml");

const CHUNK_SIZE = 1000; // Characters per chunk
const CHUNK_OVERLAP = 200; // Overlap between chunks

// â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
// TYPES
// â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

interface SourceConfig {
  id: string;
  title: string;
  source_type: string;
  authority_score: number;
  tags: string[];
}

interface DocumentChunk {
  doc_id: string;
  snippet: string;
  section?: string;
  article?: string;
  page_start?: number;
  page_end?: number;
  hash: string;
}

// â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
// HELPERS
// â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

function hashString(str: string): string {
  let hash = 0;
  for (let i = 0; i < str.length; i++) {
    const char = str.charCodeAt(i);
    hash = ((hash << 5) - hash) + char;
    hash = hash & hash;
  }
  return Math.abs(hash).toString(16);
}

/**
 * Convert number array to pgvector literal format
 * pgvector expects "[1,2,3]" not JSON with potential spacing
 */
function toPgVectorLiteral(v: number[]): string {
  return `[${v.join(",")}]`;
}

function chunkText(text: string, chunkSize: number, overlap: number): string[] {
  const chunks: string[] = [];
  let start = 0;
  
  while (start < text.length) {
    const end = Math.min(start + chunkSize, text.length);
    chunks.push(text.slice(start, end));
    start = end - overlap;
    if (start < 0) start = 0;
    if (end === text.length) break;
  }
  
  return chunks;
}

async function extractTextFromPDF(filePath: string): Promise<string> {
  try {
    const pdfParse = await import("pdf-parse");
    const buffer = fs.readFileSync(filePath);
    const data = await pdfParse.default(buffer);
    return data.text;
  } catch (err) {
    console.error(`Failed to parse PDF ${filePath}:`, err);
    return "";
  }
}

async function extractTextFromDOCX(filePath: string): Promise<string> {
  try {
    const mammoth = await import("mammoth");
    const result = await mammoth.extractRawText({ path: filePath });
    return result.value;
  } catch (err) {
    console.error(`Failed to parse DOCX ${filePath}:`, err);
    return "";
  }
}

async function extractText(filePath: string): Promise<string> {
  const ext = path.extname(filePath).toLowerCase();
  
  switch (ext) {
    case ".pdf":
      return extractTextFromPDF(filePath);
    case ".docx":
      return extractTextFromDOCX(filePath);
    case ".txt":
    case ".md":
      return fs.readFileSync(filePath, "utf-8");
    default:
      console.warn(`Unsupported file type: ${ext}`);
      return "";
  }
}

function parseSourceId(filename: string): string | null {
  // Expected format: sourceId__description.pdf
  const match = filename.match(/^([^_]+(?:_[^_]+)*)__/);
  return match ? match[1] : null;
}

// â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
// MAIN INGESTION
// â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

async function main() {
  console.log("ğŸš€ Ruzn-Lite PGVector Document Ingestion\n");

  // â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€
  // SOVEREIGN MODE ENFORCEMENT
  // â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€
  const sovereign = process.env.SOVEREIGN_MODE === "true";
  const embBackend = (process.env.EMBEDDINGS_BACKEND || "openai").toLowerCase();
  
  if (sovereign && embBackend === "openai") {
    throw new Error(
      "SOVEREIGN_MODE=true requires EMBEDDINGS_BACKEND=local for ingest. " +
      "Set EMBEDDINGS_BACKEND=local and LOCAL_EMBEDDINGS_URL."
    );
  }

  console.log(`Mode: ${sovereign ? "SOVEREIGN (local embeddings)" : "CLOUD (OpenAI embeddings)"}`);
  console.log(`Embeddings Backend: ${embBackend}\n`);

  // â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€
  // LOAD SOURCE CONFIGURATION
  // â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€
  let sourcesConfig: Record<string, SourceConfig> = {};
  
  if (fs.existsSync(LINKS_FILE)) {
    const yaml = fs.readFileSync(LINKS_FILE, "utf-8");
    const parsed = parseYaml(yaml);
    
    if (parsed.sources) {
      for (const src of parsed.sources) {
        sourcesConfig[src.id] = {
          id: src.id,
          title: src.title,
          source_type: src.source_type,
          authority_score: src.authority_score || 0.8,
          tags: src.tags || [],
        };
      }
    }
    console.log(`âœ“ Loaded ${Object.keys(sourcesConfig).length} source configs from YAML\n`);
  } else {
    console.log("âš  No oman_sources.yaml found, using defaults\n");
  }

  // â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€
  // FIND DOCUMENTS
  // â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€
  const files = await glob(`${SOURCES_DIR}/**/*.{pdf,docx,txt,md}`);
  console.log(`Found ${files.length} documents to process\n`);

  if (files.length === 0) {
    console.log("No documents found. Add files to knowledge/sources/oman/");
    process.exit(0);
  }

  // â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€
  // CONNECT TO DATABASE
  // â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€
  const pgUrl = process.env.KNOWLEDGE_PGVECTOR_URL;
  if (!pgUrl) {
    throw new Error("Missing KNOWLEDGE_PGVECTOR_URL environment variable");
  }

  const client = new Client({ connectionString: pgUrl });
  await client.connect();
  console.log("âœ“ Connected to PostgreSQL\n");

  // â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€
  // GET EMBEDDER
  // â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€
  const embed = getEmbedder();

  // â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€
  // PROCESS DOCUMENTS
  // â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€
  let totalChunks = 0;
  let totalDocs = 0;

  for (const filePath of files) {
    const filename = path.basename(filePath);
    const sourceId = parseSourceId(filename);
    const docId = hashString(filePath);
    
    console.log(`\nğŸ“„ Processing: ${filename}`);
    
    // Get source config
    const config = sourceId ? sourcesConfig[sourceId] : null;
    const title = config?.title || filename;
    const sourceType = config?.source_type || "document";
    const authorityScore = config?.authority_score || 0.5;
    const tags = config?.tags || [];

    // Extract text
    const text = await extractText(filePath);
    if (!text || text.length < 50) {
      console.log(`   âš  Skipping (no text extracted)`);
      continue;
    }

    // Insert document record
    await client.query(
      `INSERT INTO knowledge_documents (doc_id, title, source_type, authority_score, tags, url, published_date)
       VALUES ($1, $2, $3, $4, $5, $6, NOW())
       ON CONFLICT (doc_id) DO UPDATE SET
         title = EXCLUDED.title,
         source_type = EXCLUDED.source_type,
         authority_score = EXCLUDED.authority_score,
         tags = EXCLUDED.tags`,
      [docId, title, sourceType, authorityScore, tags, filePath]
    );

    // Clear old chunks for this document
    await client.query(`DELETE FROM knowledge_chunks WHERE doc_id = $1`, [docId]);

    // Chunk and embed
    const chunks = chunkText(text, CHUNK_SIZE, CHUNK_OVERLAP);
    console.log(`   âœ“ Extracted ${text.length} chars â†’ ${chunks.length} chunks`);

    for (let i = 0; i < chunks.length; i++) {
      const snippet = chunks[i];
      const chunkId = `${docId}-chunk-${i}`;
      const chunkHash = hashString(`${docId}-${i}-${snippet.slice(0, 50)}`);
      
      try {
        // Generate embedding
        const embedding = await embed(snippet);
        
        // Insert chunk with all required fields
        await client.query(
          `INSERT INTO knowledge_chunks (chunk_id, doc_id, snippet, embedding, hash, page_start)
           VALUES ($1, $2, $3, $4::vector, $5, $6)
           ON CONFLICT (chunk_id) DO UPDATE SET
             snippet = EXCLUDED.snippet,
             embedding = EXCLUDED.embedding,
             hash = EXCLUDED.hash`,
          [chunkId, docId, snippet, toPgVectorLiteral(embedding), chunkHash, i + 1]
        );
        
        totalChunks++;
        
        // Progress indicator
        if ((i + 1) % 10 === 0 || i === chunks.length - 1) {
          process.stdout.write(`   â†’ Embedded ${i + 1}/${chunks.length} chunks\r`);
        }
      } catch (err) {
        console.error(`\n   âœ— Failed to embed chunk ${i}:`, err);
      }
    }
    
    console.log(`   âœ“ Ingested ${chunks.length} chunks`);
    totalDocs++;
  }

  // â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€
  // SUMMARY
  // â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€
  await client.end();

  console.log("\n" + "â•".repeat(50));
  console.log("âœ… INGESTION COMPLETE");
  console.log("â•".repeat(50));
  console.log(`   Documents processed: ${totalDocs}`);
  console.log(`   Total chunks embedded: ${totalChunks}`);
  console.log(`   Dataset version: ${process.env.KNOWLEDGE_DATASET_VERSION || "pgv-v1"}`);
}

main().catch((err) => {
  console.error("âŒ Ingestion failed:", err);
  process.exit(1);
});


================================================================================
FILE: knowledge/sources/.gitignore
================================================================================

# Ignore all documents (user-specific data)
*.pdf
*.docx
*.doc
*.txt

# Keep .gitkeep files
!.gitkeep
!documents/.gitkeep

# OSAI 2021 Annual Report - Key Statistics

## Audit Statistics (2021)

| Metric | 2020 | 2021 | Change |
|--------|------|------|--------|
| Performance Audits | 38 | 54 | +42% |
| Compliance Audits | 118 | 138 | +17% |
| Total Audits | 156 | 192 | +23% |
| Reports Issued (Performance) | 44 | 52 | +18% |
| Reports Issued (Compliance) | 146 | 156 | +7% |
| Total Reports Issued | 190 | 208 | +9% |

## Direct Added Value (2021)

| Metric | Amount (OMR Million) |
|--------|---------------------|
| Total Collection, Recovery & Savings | 76.5 |
| Collection/Recovery | 44.0 |
| Financial Savings | 32.5 |

## Legal Cases (2021)

- **Total Cases**: 101 cases with rulings issued
- **Imprisonment**: 3 months to 3 years
- **Fines**: OMR 300 to OMR 21,000

### Violation Types Prosecuted:
1. Forgery of official instruments
2. Use of forged instruments knowingly
3. Illegal data entry into government systems
4. Asking for bribes
5. Squandering public funds
6. Abuse of position
7. Misuse of work position
8. Breach of duties

## Tax-Related Findings (2021)

| Category | Amount (OMR Million) | Issue |
|----------|---------------------|-------|
| Tax Evasion | 5 | Uncollected tax value (19 cases) |
| Suspected Evasion | 70 | Value in incomplete cases (10/45 cases) |
| Companies Income Tax | 46 | Mining sector non-compliance |
| Uncollected Tax | 209 | Tax Authority collection issues |
| Withholding Tax | 52 | Companies non-compliance |

## Key Observations

### State Administrative Apparatus
- Tax evasion cases taking 54-123 months to complete
- Individual case processing: 15 days to 33+ months

### Processing Time Issues
- Significant delays in tax evasion case resolution
- Need for strengthened follow-up procedures

# OSAI 2022 Annual Report - Key Statistics

## Audit Statistics (2022)

| Metric | 2021 | 2022 | Change |
|--------|------|------|--------|
| Conducted Audits (Total) | 192 | 181 | -6% |
| Audit Reports (Total) | 208 | 147 | -29% |
| Government Units - Audits | 120 | 103 | -14% |
| Government Units - Reports | 150 | 89 | -41% |
| Authorities/Companies - Audits | 72 | 78 | +8% |
| Authorities/Companies - Reports | 58 | 58 | 0% |

## Observations Implementation (2022)

| Category | 2021 Observations | 2021 Implemented | 2022 Observations | 2022 Implemented |
|----------|-------------------|------------------|-------------------|------------------|
| Total | 3,321 | 39% | 1,591 | 23% |
| Government Units | 1,962 | 46% | 1,005 | 28% |
| Authorities/Companies | 1,359 | 29% | 586 | 14% |

## Direct Added Value (2022)

| Metric | Amount (OMR Million) |
|--------|---------------------|
| Collection & Recovery Total | 17.8 |
| Government Units | 3.8 |
| Authorities/Investments/Companies | 14 |
| Treasury Recovery (from 2021 follow-up) | 80 |

## Legal Cases (2022)

- **Total Cases**: 113 financial and administrative irregularities
- **Referred to Public Prosecution**: 14
- **Under Investigation**: 32
- **Cases before Court (previous years)**: 67
- **Imprisonment Range**: 1 month to 10 years
- **Fines Range**: OMR 100 to OMR 78,000

### Violation Categories:
1. Bribery
2. Forgery in official instruments
3. Embezzlement
4. Misuse of position
5. Information forgery in government data
6. Abuse of position
7. Conflict of interest
8. Misuse of public fund
9. Failure to perform job duties

## Complaints & Reports (2022)

| Category | 2021 | 2022 | Change |
|----------|------|------|--------|
| Financial & Administrative Irregularities | 405 | 459 | +13% |
| Employee Grievances | 19 | 28 | +47% |
| Disruption of Citizens Interests | 35 | 74 | +111% |
| Improper Tendering Process | 22 | 21 | -5% |
| Abuse of Power | 24 | 5 | -79% |
| **Total** | **505** | **587** | **+16%** |
| Completion Rate | 93% | 84% | -9% |

## Complaints by Entity (2022)

| Entity | 2021 | 2022 |
|--------|------|------|
| Ministry of Housing & Urban Planning | 111 | 119 |
| Municipalities Sector | 110 | 93 |
| Ministry of Health | 37 | 31 |
| Nama Holding Company | 16 | 25 |
| Ministry of Education | 34 | 20 |
| Ministry of Labour | 24 | 15 |
| Ministry of Endowments | 11 | 18 |
| Civil Aviation Authority | 10 | 9 |
| Oman Air | 9 | 11 |
| Petroleum Development Oman | 6 | 4 |
| Oman Water & Wastewater | 6 | 10 |

## Legislative Review (2022)

| Metric | 2021 | 2022 |
|--------|------|------|
| Laws/Regulations/Decisions Reviewed | 57 | 81 |
| From Ministries | 27 | 33 |
| From Authorities & Establishments | 17 | 25 |
| From Others | 13 | 23 |

## Notable Conviction Examples (2022)

1. **Money Laundering Case**: Director at government company - 10 years imprisonment, OMR 51,700 fine, deportation
2. **Embezzlement Case**: Ministry employee - 5 years imprisonment, OMR 50,000 fine (embezzled OMR 8,299)
3. **Forgery Case**: Female employee - 3 years imprisonment, removal from office, deportation (embezzled OMR 4,146)

# OSAI 2023 Annual Report - Key Statistics

## Direct Added Value (2023)

| Metric | Amount (OMR Million) |
|--------|---------------------|
| Total Collection & Recovery | 177.7 |
| Receivables Collected in 2023 | 95 |
| Receivables Collected in 2022 | 82.7 |
| Government Units | 13.8 |
| Authorities, Investments & Companies | 81.2 |

## Legal Cases (2023)

| Metric | 2022 | 2023 | Change |
|--------|------|------|--------|
| Cases Addressed by SAI | 113 | 115 | +2% |
| Referred to Public Prosecution | 14 | 28 | +100% |
| Under Investigation | 32 | 22 | -31% |
| Pending from Previous Years | 67 | 65 | -3% |

### Imprisonment & Fines (2023)
- **Imprisonment Range**: 1 month to 10 years
- **Fines Range**: OMR 200 to OMR 63,000

### Violation Categories (2023):
1. Acceptance of bribery to perform act contrary to job duties
2. Embezzlement of public fund
3. Money laundering
4. Information forgery in government data
5. Forgery in official and customary documents
6. Use of forged instrument with knowledge of its forgery
7. Use of position to realize an advantage
8. Transgression of public fund
9. Conflict of interest
10. Failure to perform job duties

## Notable Conviction Examples (2023)

### Oman Fisheries Company
- **Position**: Marketing and Sales Manager
- **Violations**: 
  - Accepted USD 5,400 bribe
  - Accepted USD 794 from foreign company
  - Attempted to obtain USD 7,115 from another foreign company
  - Laundered USD 6,194 at bank outside Oman
- **Convictions**:
  - Money laundering (felony)
  - Misuse of position
  - Violation of Foreigners Residency Law
- **Sentence**: 
  - 10 years imprisonment + OMR 50,000 fine (1st conviction)
  - 3 years imprisonment + OMR 1,000 fine (2nd conviction)
  - 1 year imprisonment + OMR 500 fine (3rd conviction)
  - 1 month imprisonment + OMR 200 fine (4th conviction)
  - Confiscation of funds
  - Removal from office
  - Permanent deportation

## Audit Findings (2023)

### Natural Shrimp Aquaculture Company
- **Loss**: OMR 3.7 million (revenue loss Jan 2022 - May 2023)
- **Issue**: Non-achievement of harvest targets, below-target selling prices
- **Action**: Nursery ponds commissioned, survival rate reached 90% vs 65% target

### Oman Environmental Services (be'ah)
- **Loss**: OMR 151,000 (penalty reductions May 2021 - April 2023)
- **Issue**: Decline in solid waste management contractor performance (17% decrease)
- **Additional**: OMR 40,000 non-collected contribution (2019-2022)
- **Action**: KPIs amended, amount collected September 2023

## Royal Assignment Tasks (2023)

### Omanization Review
- Reviewed Omanization indicators in private sector
- Evaluated succession plans in government companies
- Proposals submitted to His Majesty including:
  - Cease recruitment of non-Omanis for Omanized professions
  - Increase Omanization in technical/supervisory roles
  - Match job titles between company and Ministry of Labour records
  - Require succession plans for non-Omani positions

### National Product Purchase Review
- Audited 165 units commitment to national products
- Proposals to establish electronic platform for local products database
- Recommendations for standardized procurement forms

## Year-over-Year Comparison Summary

| Metric | 2021 | 2022 | 2023 |
|--------|------|------|------|
| Total Recovery (OMR M) | 76.5 | 97.8 | 177.7 |
| Legal Cases | 101 | 113 | 115 |
| Referred to Prosecution | - | 14 | 28 |
| Max Imprisonment | 3 years | 10 years | 10 years |
| Max Fine (OMR) | 21,000 | 78,000 | 63,000 |

# OSAI Annual Report 2024 - Key Statistics and Case Examples
## Ø§Ù„ØªÙ‚Ø±ÙŠØ± Ø§Ù„Ø³Ù†ÙˆÙŠ 2024 - Ø§Ù„Ø¥Ø­ØµØ§Ø¦ÙŠØ§Øª ÙˆØ§Ù„Ø£Ù…Ø«Ù„Ø©

|--------|--------------|
| **Due amounts collected/recovered in 2024** | 25 million |

## Financial and Administrative Irregularities (2024)

| Category | Count |
|----------|-------|
| **Cases under judicial consideration** | 25 |
| - Cases reported by the Authority | 9 |
| - Cases reported by entities subject to audit | 10 |
| - Assignment Orders from Public Prosecution | 6 |
| **Investigation minutes with the Authority** | 47 |

## Classification of Public Fund Cases

Based on the 2024 Annual Report, OSAI addresses the following violation types:

1. **Use of position to realize an advantage** (Ø§Ø³ØªØºÙ„Ø§Ù„ Ø§Ù„Ù…Ù†ØµØ¨ Ù„ØªØ­Ù‚ÙŠÙ‚ Ù…Ù†ÙØ¹Ø©)
2. **Acceptance of bribery** to perform an act contrary to job duties (Ù‚Ø¨ÙˆÙ„ Ø§Ù„Ø±Ø´ÙˆØ©)
3. **Information forgery** (ØªØ²ÙˆÙŠØ± Ø§Ù„Ù…Ø¹Ù„ÙˆÙ…Ø§Øª)
4. **Forgery in official instruments** (Ø§Ù„ØªØ²ÙˆÙŠØ± ÙÙŠ Ø§Ù„Ù…Ø­Ø±Ø±Ø§Øª Ø§Ù„Ø±Ø³Ù…ÙŠØ©)
5. **Embezzlement of public fund** (Ø§Ø®ØªÙ„Ø§Ø³ Ø§Ù„Ù…Ø§Ù„ Ø§Ù„Ø¹Ø§Ù…)
6. **Failure to perform job duties** (Ø§Ù„Ø¥Ø®Ù„Ø§Ù„ Ø¨ÙˆØ§Ø¬Ø¨Ø§Øª Ø§Ù„ÙˆØ¸ÙŠÙØ©)
7. **Transgression of public fund** (Ø§Ù„ØªØ¹Ø¯ÙŠ Ø¹Ù„Ù‰ Ø§Ù„Ù…Ø§Ù„ Ø§Ù„Ø¹Ø§Ù…)

---

## Real Conviction Examples (2024)

### Case 1: Environment Authority (Al Wusta Governorate)
**Violations:**
- Using positions to realize advantage for themselves and others
- Profiting from jobs by exceeding powers
- Permitting transport of filling materials without approval
- Non-issuance of environmental violations

**Convictions:**
- Accepting bribe to perform task contrary to job duties
- Forgery in official instrument
- Using forged document with knowledge
- Money laundering
- Breach of job duties
- Misuse of public fund

**Penalties:**
- Imprisonment: 6 months to 1 year
- Removal from public office
- Permanent prohibition from assuming public office
- Fine: OMR 71,226
- One accused: Permanent deportation

---

### Case 2: Telecommunication Company
**Violations:**
- Abusing position to realize personal advantage
- Embezzling public funds
- Using forged instruments
- Conducting fraudulent guarantee refund transactions

**Convictions:**
- Embezzlement by forgery
- Forgery in official instruments
- Using forged instrument with knowledge
- Using IT means to commit information forgery
- Using position to realize personal advantage
- Public fund transgression
- Using public office to realize advantage

**Penalties:**
- 2-year imprisonment
- Fine: OMR 111,925
- Restitution: OMR 111,925
- Removal from office
- Permanent prohibition from public office

---

### Case 3: Oman Investment Authority
**Violations:**
- Abusing position in Contract and Procurement Department
- Embezzling public funds related to travel invoices
- Suspected forgery in employee ticket quotations
- Collusion with travel agency owned by relative
- Manipulating airline ticket prices

**Convictions:**
- Embezzlement by forgery
- Using IT means to commit information forgery crime
- Information forgery in government data
- Deliberately failing to perform job duties
- Using job to realize advantage for self and others
- Transgressing public fund
- Money laundering

**Penalties:**
- 5-year imprisonment
- Fine: OMR 407,334
- Removal from office
- Permanent prohibition from public office
- Restitution: OMR 407,334 (joint with another accused)
- Additional: 5-year imprisonment for money laundering + OMR 50,000 fine
- Co-accused (travel company owner): Same charges + money laundering
- Third accused: 1-year imprisonment + OMR 10,000 fine

---

### Case 4: Oman Air
**Violations:**
- Using authorities in booking system (call center)
- Changing and upgrading travel tickets
- Misappropriating service fees

**Penalties:**
- 1-year imprisonment
- Removal from office
- Permanent prohibition from public office

---

### Case 5: Sohar Municipality
**Violations:**
- Using position and profiting from job
- Issuing administrative violations against private sector establishments
- Collecting violation amounts in cash without depositing

**Convictions:**
- Misuse of position
- Violation of duties to obtain benefit
- Using position to realize advantage

**Penalties:**
- 1-year imprisonment (3 months to be served)

---

## Ruzn Classification Enhancement

| Forgery | ØªØ²ÙˆÙŠØ± | HIGH | 1-5 years + fine |
| Position Abuse | Ø§Ø³ØªØºÙ„Ø§Ù„ Ø§Ù„Ù…Ù†ØµØ¨ | HIGH | 1-2 years + removal |

# National Integrity Promotion and Anti-Corruption Plan 2022-2030
## Ø§Ù„Ø®Ø·Ø© Ø§Ù„ÙˆØ·Ù†ÙŠØ© Ù„ØªØ¹Ø²ÙŠØ² Ø§Ù„Ù†Ø²Ø§Ù‡Ø© 2022-2030

### Royal Speech - Ø§Ù„Ù†Ø·Ù‚ Ø§Ù„Ø³Ø§Ù…ÙŠ
> "Ø¥Ù† Ø¨Ù†Ø§Ø¡ Ø§Ù„Ø£Ù…Ù… ÙˆØªØ·ÙˆØ±Ù‡Ø§ Ù…Ø³Ø¤ÙˆÙ„ÙŠØ© Ø¹Ø§Ù…Ø© ÙŠÙ„ØªØ²Ù… Ø¨Ù‡Ø§ Ø§Ù„Ø¬Ù…ÙŠØ¹ ÙˆÙ„Ø§ ÙŠÙØ³ØªØ«Ù†Ù‰ Ø£Ø­Ø¯ Ù…Ù† Ø§Ù„Ù‚ÙŠØ§Ù… Ø¨Ø¯ÙˆØ±Ù‡ ÙÙŠÙ‡Ø§ØŒ ÙƒÙ„ ÙÙŠ Ù…Ø¬Ø§Ù„Ù‡ ÙˆØ¨Ù‚Ø¯Ø± Ø§Ø³ØªØ·Ø§Ø¹ØªÙ‡... ÙˆØ§Ù„Ù†Ø²Ø§Ù‡Ø© Ø§Ù„ØªÙŠ Ù„Ø§ Ø¨Ø¯Ù‘ Ø£Ù† ØªØ³ÙˆØ¯ ÙƒØ§ÙØ© Ù‚Ø·Ø§Ø¹Ø§Øª Ø§Ù„Ø¹Ù…Ù„ ÙˆØ£Ù† ØªÙƒÙˆÙ† Ø£Ø³Ø§Ø³Ø§Ù‹ Ø«Ø§Ø¨ØªØ§Ù‹ Ø±Ø§Ø³Ø®Ø§Ù‹ Ù„ÙƒÙ„ Ù…Ø§ Ù†Ù‚ÙˆÙ… Ø¨Ù‡"
> 
> â€” His Majesty Sultan Haitham bin Tarik, February 23, 2020

---

## Vision - Ø§Ù„Ø±Ø¤ÙŠØ©
**Ù…Ø¤Ø³Ø³Ø§Øª Ù†Ø²ÙŠÙ‡Ø© ÙˆÙ‚ÙˆØ§Ù†ÙŠÙ† ÙØ§Ø¹Ù„Ø© ÙˆÙ…Ø¬ØªÙ…Ø¹ ÙˆØ§Ø¹Ù**
"Institutions with integrity, effective laws, and an aware society"

## Mission - Ø§Ù„Ø±Ø³Ø§Ù„Ø©
ØªØ¨Ù†ÙŠ Ø£ÙØ¶Ù„ Ø§Ù„Ù…Ù…Ø§Ø±Ø³Ø§Øª ÙÙŠ Ù…Ø¬Ø§Ù„Ø§Øª Ø§Ù„Ù†Ø²Ø§Ù‡Ø© ÙˆØ§Ù„Ø´ÙØ§ÙÙŠØ© ÙˆÙ…ÙÙƒØ§ÙØ­Ø© Ø§Ù„ÙØ³Ø§Ø¯ Ø¨Ù…Ø´Ø§Ø±ÙƒØ© ÙØ§Ø¹Ù„Ø© Ø¨ÙŠÙ† Ø§Ù„Ù‚Ø·Ø§Ø¹ÙŠÙ† Ø§Ù„Ø¹Ø§Ù… ÙˆØ§Ù„Ø®Ø§Øµ ÙˆÙ…Ø¤Ø³Ø³Ø§Øª Ø§Ù„Ù…Ø¬ØªÙ…Ø¹ Ø§Ù„Ù…Ø¯Ù†ÙŠ ÙˆØ§Ù„Ø£ÙØ±Ø§Ø¯

"Adopting best practices in integrity, transparency, and anti-corruption with active participation between public and private sectors, civil society institutions, and individuals"

## Core Principles - Ø§Ù„Ù…Ø¨Ø§Ø¯Ø¦

| Principle | Arabic | Description |
|-----------|--------|-------------|
| **Integrity** | Ø§Ù„Ù†Ø²Ø§Ù‡Ø© | ØªØ¨Ù†ÙŠ Ù…Ø¨Ø§Ø¯Ø¦ ÙˆÙ‚ÙŠÙ… Ø§Ù„Ù†Ø²Ø§Ù‡Ø© ÙˆÙ…Ù…Ø§Ø±Ø³Ø§ØªÙ‡Ø§ Ø§Ù„Ù‚ÙˆÙŠÙ…Ø© ØªØ¬Ø§Ù‡ Ø§Ù„Ù…Ø§Ù„ Ø§Ù„Ø¹Ø§Ù… ÙˆØ§Ù„ÙˆØ¸ÙŠÙØ© Ø§Ù„Ø¹Ø§Ù…Ø© |

| **Accountability** | Ø§Ù„Ù…Ø³Ø§Ø¡Ù„Ø© ÙˆØ§Ù„Ù…Ø­Ø§Ø³Ø¨Ø© | ØªØ´Ø±ÙŠØ¹Ø§Øª Ø´Ø§Ù…Ù„Ø© ÙˆØ¥Ø¬Ø±Ø§Ø¡Ø§Øª Ø°Ø§Øª ÙƒÙØ§Ø¡Ø© Ù„ØªÙØ¹ÙŠÙ„ Ø§Ù„Ù…Ø³Ø§Ø¡Ù„Ø© ÙˆØ§Ù„Ù…Ø­Ø§Ø³Ø¨Ø© |
| **Partnership** | Ø§Ù„Ø´Ø±Ø§ÙƒØ© | ØªØ¹Ø§ÙˆÙ† ÙØ§Ø¹Ù„ Ù…Ù† ÙƒØ§ÙØ© Ø§Ù„Ø£Ø·Ø±Ø§Ù Ø°Ø§Øª Ø§Ù„Ø¹Ù„Ø§Ù‚Ø© |

## Five Strategic Pillars - Ø§Ù„Ù…Ø­Ø§ÙˆØ± Ø§Ù„Ø®Ù…Ø³Ø©

### Pillar 1: Comprehensive Legislative Framework (Ù…Ù†Ø¸ÙˆÙ…Ø© ØªØ´Ø±ÙŠØ¹ÙŠØ© Ø´Ø§Ù…Ù„Ø©)
**Main Goal:** ØªØ¹Ø²ÙŠØ² Ø§Ù„Ù†Ø²Ø§Ù‡Ø© ÙˆÙ…ÙƒØ§ÙØ­Ø© Ø§Ù„ÙØ³Ø§Ø¯ ÙˆÙÙ‚ Ù…Ù†Ø¸ÙˆÙ…Ø© ØªØ´Ø±ÙŠØ¹ÙŠØ© Ø´Ø§Ù…Ù„Ø© ÙˆÙ…ÙˆØ§Ø±Ø¯ Ø¨Ø´Ø±ÙŠØ© Ø°Ø§Øª ÙƒÙØ§Ø¡Ø©

### Pillar 2: Efficient Institutional Performance (Ø£Ø¯Ø§Ø¡ Ù…Ø¤Ø³Ø³ÙŠ ÙƒÙØ¤)

## International Framework

Oman is committed to:
- **UN Convention Against Corruption** (UNCAC) - Royal Decree 64/2013
- **Arab Anti-Corruption Convention** - Royal Decree 28/2014
- **Oman Vision 2040** alignment

1. **Complaint prioritization** based on strategic pillars
2. **Risk assessment** aligned with national KPIs
3. **Entity evaluation** against institutional performance standards
4. **Trend analysis** comparing against international benchmarks

# OSAI Complete Knowledge Base for Ruzn
## Ù‚Ø§Ø¹Ø¯Ø© Ø§Ù„Ù…Ø¹Ø±ÙØ© Ø§Ù„Ø´Ø§Ù…Ù„Ø© Ù„Ø¬Ù‡Ø§Ø² Ø§Ù„Ø±Ù‚Ø§Ø¨Ø© Ø§Ù„Ù…Ø§Ù„ÙŠØ© ÙˆØ§Ù„Ø¥Ø¯Ø§Ø±ÙŠØ© Ù„Ù„Ø¯ÙˆÙ„Ø©

---

## 1. Legal Framework (Ø§Ù„Ø¥Ø·Ø§Ø± Ø§Ù„Ù‚Ø§Ù†ÙˆÙ†ÙŠ)

### Royal Decree 111/2011 - State Audit Law
**Ù‚Ø§Ù†ÙˆÙ† Ø§Ù„Ø±Ù‚Ø§Ø¨Ø© Ø§Ù„Ù…Ø§Ù„ÙŠØ© ÙˆØ§Ù„Ø¥Ø¯Ø§Ø±ÙŠØ© Ù„Ù„Ø¯ÙˆÙ„Ø©**

**Institution Status:**
- Legal personality with financial and administrative independence
- Reports directly to His Majesty the Sultan
- Members have judicial police authority (ØµÙØ© Ø§Ù„Ø¶Ø¨Ø·ÙŠØ© Ø§Ù„Ù‚Ø¶Ø§Ø¦ÙŠØ©)

**Core Objectives (Article 8):**
1. Protection of public funds (Ø­Ù…Ø§ÙŠØ© Ø§Ù„Ø£Ù…ÙˆØ§Ù„ Ø§Ù„Ø¹Ø§Ù…Ø©)
2. Verification of compliance with laws and regulations
3. Avoidance of conflicts of interest (ØªØ¬Ù†Ø¨ ØªØ¶Ø§Ø±Ø¨ Ø§Ù„Ù…ØµØ§Ù„Ø­)
4. Commitment to transparency (Ø§Ù„Ø´ÙØ§ÙÙŠØ©)
5. Preventive oversight (Ø§Ù„Ø±Ù‚Ø§Ø¨Ø© Ø§Ù„ÙˆÙ‚Ø§Ø¦ÙŠØ©)
6. Performance evaluation (economically, efficiently, effectively)

**Oversight Areas (Article 9):**
- Financial oversight (Ø§Ù„Ø±Ù‚Ø§Ø¨Ø© Ø§Ù„Ù…Ø§Ù„ÙŠØ©)
- Administrative oversight (Ø§Ù„Ø±Ù‚Ø§Ø¨Ø© Ø§Ù„Ø¥Ø¯Ø§Ø±ÙŠØ©)
- Performance oversight (Ø±Ù‚Ø§Ø¨Ø© Ø§Ù„Ø£Ø¯Ø§Ø¡)
- Investment oversight

---

### Royal Decree 112/2011 - Protection of Public Funds Law
**Ù‚Ø§Ù†ÙˆÙ† Ø­Ù…Ø§ÙŠØ© Ø§Ù„Ù…Ø§Ù„ Ø§Ù„Ø¹Ø§Ù… ÙˆØªØ¬Ù†Ø¨ ØªØ¶Ø§Ø±Ø¨ Ø§Ù„Ù…ØµØ§Ù„Ø­**

**Key Prohibitions:**

| Article | Prohibition | Arabic |
|---------|-------------|--------|
| 4 | Misuse of public funds | Ø¥Ø³Ø§Ø¡Ø© Ø§Ø³ØªØ¹Ù…Ø§Ù„ Ø§Ù„Ù…Ø§Ù„ Ø§Ù„Ø¹Ø§Ù… |
| 5 | Failure to report violations | Ø¹Ø¯Ù… Ø§Ù„Ø¥Ø¨Ù„Ø§Øº Ø¹Ù† Ø§Ù„Ù…Ø®Ø§Ù„ÙØ§Øª |
| 6 | Conflict of interest in supervised entities | ØªØ¶Ø§Ø±Ø¨ Ø§Ù„Ù…ØµØ§Ù„Ø­ |
| 7 | Abuse of position for personal benefit | Ø§Ø³ØªØºÙ„Ø§Ù„ Ø§Ù„Ù…Ù†ØµØ¨ |
| 8 | Acting as agent/mediator | Ø§Ù„ÙˆØ³Ø§Ø·Ø© Ø§Ù„Ù…Ø­Ø¸ÙˆØ±Ø© |
| 9 | Personal use of public funds | Ø§Ù„Ø§Ø³ØªØ®Ø¯Ø§Ù… Ø§Ù„Ø´Ø®ØµÙŠ Ù„Ù„Ù…Ø§Ù„ Ø§Ù„Ø¹Ø§Ù… |
| 10 | Unauthorized private sector work | Ø§Ù„Ø¹Ù…Ù„ Ø¨Ø§Ù„Ù‚Ø·Ø§Ø¹ Ø§Ù„Ø®Ø§Øµ Ø¯ÙˆÙ† ØªØ±Ø®ÙŠØµ |
| 11 | Ownership stakes in connected companies | Ù…Ù„ÙƒÙŠØ© Ø£Ø³Ù‡Ù… ÙÙŠ Ø´Ø±ÙƒØ§Øª Ù…Ø±ØªØ¨Ø·Ø© |
| 12 | Financial disclosure violations | Ù…Ø®Ø§Ù„ÙØ© Ø§Ù„Ø¥ÙØµØ§Ø­ Ø§Ù„Ù…Ø§Ù„ÙŠ |
| 13 | Breach of confidentiality | Ø¥ÙØ´Ø§Ø¡ Ø§Ù„Ø£Ø³Ø±Ø§Ø± |

**Penalties:**

| Violation | Penalty |
|-----------|---------|
| Articles 4, 5, 8, 9, 10, 12 | 6 months - 2 years imprisonment |
| Article 7 (Abuse of position) | 1 - 3 years imprisonment |
| Article 11 (Ownership stakes) | 3 months - 1 year imprisonment |
| All above | Dismissal + Confiscation of funds |

---

## 2. Complaint Classification System

### Primary Categories

| Category | Arabic | Legal Basis | Risk Level |
|----------|--------|-------------|------------|
| **Embezzlement** | Ø§Ø®ØªÙ„Ø§Ø³ Ø§Ù„Ù…Ø§Ù„ Ø§Ù„Ø¹Ø§Ù… | RD 112/2011 Art. 4, 9 | CRITICAL (90-100) |
| **Bribery** | Ø±Ø´ÙˆØ© | Penal Code + RD 112 | CRITICAL (90-100) |
| **Money Laundering** | ØºØ³ÙŠÙ„ Ø£Ù…ÙˆØ§Ù„ | AML Law | CRITICAL (90-100) |
| **Forgery** | ØªØ²ÙˆÙŠØ± | Penal Code | HIGH (70-89) |
| **Position Abuse** | Ø§Ø³ØªØºÙ„Ø§Ù„ Ø§Ù„Ù…Ù†ØµØ¨ | RD 112/2011 Art. 7 | HIGH (70-89) |
| **Conflict of Interest** | ØªØ¶Ø§Ø±Ø¨ Ø§Ù„Ù…ØµØ§Ù„Ø­ | RD 112/2011 Art. 6, 11 | HIGH (70-89) |
| **Procurement Violation** | Ù…Ø®Ø§Ù„ÙØ© Ø§Ù„Ù…Ù†Ø§Ù‚ØµØ§Øª | Tender Law | HIGH (70-89) |
| **Duty Failure** | Ø¥Ø®Ù„Ø§Ù„ Ø¨Ø§Ù„ÙˆØ§Ø¬Ø¨Ø§Øª | RD 111/2011 Art. 8 | MEDIUM (40-69) |
| **Transparency Violation** | Ù…Ø®Ø§Ù„ÙØ© Ø§Ù„Ø´ÙØ§ÙÙŠØ© | RD 111/2011 Art. 8(5) | MEDIUM (40-69) |
| **Administrative Negligence** | Ø¥Ù‡Ù…Ø§Ù„ Ø¥Ø¯Ø§Ø±ÙŠ | RD 111/2011 Art. 8(7) | LOW (20-39) |

### Sub-Categories (from 2024 Annual Report)

1. **Use of position to realize advantage** - Ø§Ø³ØªØºÙ„Ø§Ù„ Ø§Ù„Ù…Ù†ØµØ¨ Ù„ØªØ­Ù‚ÙŠÙ‚ Ù…Ù†ÙØ¹Ø©
2. **Acceptance of bribery** - Ù‚Ø¨ÙˆÙ„ Ø§Ù„Ø±Ø´ÙˆØ©
3. **Information forgery** - ØªØ²ÙˆÙŠØ± Ø§Ù„Ù…Ø¹Ù„ÙˆÙ…Ø§Øª
4. **Forgery in official instruments** - Ø§Ù„ØªØ²ÙˆÙŠØ± ÙÙŠ Ø§Ù„Ù…Ø­Ø±Ø±Ø§Øª Ø§Ù„Ø±Ø³Ù…ÙŠØ©
5. **Embezzlement of public fund** - Ø§Ø®ØªÙ„Ø§Ø³ Ø§Ù„Ù…Ø§Ù„ Ø§Ù„Ø¹Ø§Ù…
6. **Failure to perform job duties** - Ø§Ù„Ø¥Ø®Ù„Ø§Ù„ Ø¨ÙˆØ§Ø¬Ø¨Ø§Øª Ø§Ù„ÙˆØ¸ÙŠÙØ©
7. **Transgression of public fund** - Ø§Ù„ØªØ¹Ø¯ÙŠ Ø¹Ù„Ù‰ Ø§Ù„Ù…Ø§Ù„ Ø§Ù„Ø¹Ø§Ù…

---

## 3. Risk Scoring Matrix

### Severity Factors

| Factor | Weight | Description |
|--------|--------|-------------|
| **Financial Impact** | 30% | Amount of public funds at risk |
| **Legal Severity** | 25% | Applicable penalty range |
| **Position Level** | 15% | Seniority of accused official |
| **Evidence Strength** | 15% | Quality and completeness of evidence |
| **Systemic Risk** | 15% | Potential for widespread impact |

### Financial Impact Thresholds (OMR)

| Range | Score | Classification |
|-------|-------|----------------|
| > 100,000 | 100 | Critical |
| 50,000 - 100,000 | 80 | High |
| 10,000 - 50,000 | 60 | Medium-High |
| 1,000 - 10,000 | 40 | Medium |
| < 1,000 | 20 | Low |

### Position Level Multiplier

| Level | Multiplier |
|-------|------------|
| Minister / Undersecretary | 1.5x |
| Director General | 1.3x |
| Director | 1.2x |
| Head of Department | 1.1x |
| Staff | 1.0x |

## 5. 2024 Statistics

### Audit Recovery
- **OMR 25 million** recovered in 2024
- **OMR 33 million** recovered after 2023 report
- **72 cases** addressed (financial/administrative irregularities)
- **25 cases** under judicial consideration
- **47 investigation** minutes with Authority

### Conviction Examples (Penalties Applied)

| Entity | Violation | Penalty |
|--------|-----------|---------|
| Environment Authority | Bribery, Forgery, Money Laundering | 6-12 months + OMR 71,226 fine |
| Telecom Company | Embezzlement, Forgery | 2 years + OMR 111,925 fine + restitution |
| Oman Investment Authority | Embezzlement, Money Laundering | 5 years + OMR 407,334 fine + restitution |
| Oman Air | Position Abuse | 1 year + removal |
| Sohar Municipality | Position Abuse | 1 year (3 months served) |

## 6. National Integrity Plan 2022-2030

### Vision
**Ù…Ø¤Ø³Ø³Ø§Øª Ù†Ø²ÙŠÙ‡Ø© ÙˆÙ‚ÙˆØ§Ù†ÙŠÙ† ÙØ§Ø¹Ù„Ø© ÙˆÙ…Ø¬ØªÙ…Ø¹ ÙˆØ§Ø¹Ù**
"Institutions with integrity, effective laws, and an aware society"

### Core Principles
1. **Ø§Ù„Ù†Ø²Ø§Ù‡Ø©** (Integrity)
2. **Ø§Ù„Ø´ÙØ§ÙÙŠØ©** (Transparency)
3. **Ø§Ù„Ù…Ø³Ø§Ø¡Ù„Ø© ÙˆØ§Ù„Ù…Ø­Ø§Ø³Ø¨Ø©** (Accountability)
4. **Ø§Ù„Ø´Ø±Ø§ÙƒØ©** (Partnership)

### Five Strategic Pillars
1. Comprehensive Legislative Framework (Ù…Ù†Ø¸ÙˆÙ…Ø© ØªØ´Ø±ÙŠØ¹ÙŠØ© Ø´Ø§Ù…Ù„Ø©)
2. Efficient Institutional Performance (Ø£Ø¯Ø§Ø¡ Ù…Ø¤Ø³Ø³ÙŠ ÙƒÙØ¤)
3. Ethical Private Sector (Ù‚Ø·Ø§Ø¹ Ø®Ø§Øµ Ù†Ø²ÙŠÙ‡)
4. Transparency and Community Participation (Ø´ÙØ§ÙÙŠØ© ÙˆÙ…Ø´Ø§Ø±ÙƒØ© Ù…Ø¬ØªÙ…Ø¹ÙŠØ©)
5. Local and International Cooperation (ØªØ¹Ø§ÙˆÙ† ÙˆØ´Ø±Ø§ÙƒØ©)

### Target KPIs by 2030
- Corruption Perceptions Index: Score > 63, Top 30 countries
- Global Competitiveness (Corruption): Score > 71, Top 30
- Ease of Doing Business: Score > 79.58, Top 20
- E-Government Development: Score > 0.8301, Top 20

## 8. Legal Citations Format

When responding to queries, Ruzn should cite laws as follows:

**Format:** `[Law Name] - Article [Number] ([Arabic Name])`

**Examples:**
- State Audit Law - Article 8 (Ù‚Ø§Ù†ÙˆÙ† Ø§Ù„Ø±Ù‚Ø§Ø¨Ø© Ø§Ù„Ù…Ø§Ù„ÙŠØ© - Ø§Ù„Ù…Ø§Ø¯Ø© 8)
- Protection of Public Funds Law - Article 7 (Ù‚Ø§Ù†ÙˆÙ† Ø­Ù…Ø§ÙŠØ© Ø§Ù„Ù…Ø§Ù„ Ø§Ù„Ø¹Ø§Ù… - Ø§Ù„Ù…Ø§Ø¯Ø© 7)
- Royal Decree 111/2011 - Article 9 (Ø§Ù„Ù…Ø±Ø³ÙˆÙ… Ø§Ù„Ø³Ù„Ø·Ø§Ù†ÙŠ 111/2011 - Ø§Ù„Ù…Ø§Ø¯Ø© 9)

# Law on Protection of Public Funds and Avoidance of Conflict of Interest
## Ù‚Ø§Ù†ÙˆÙ† Ø­Ù…Ø§ÙŠØ© Ø§Ù„Ù…Ø§Ù„ Ø§Ù„Ø¹Ø§Ù… ÙˆØªØ¬Ù†Ø¨ ØªØ¶Ø§Ø±Ø¨ Ø§Ù„Ù…ØµØ§Ù„Ø­ - Ø§Ù„Ù…Ø±Ø³ÙˆÙ… Ø§Ù„Ø³Ù„Ø·Ø§Ù†ÙŠ Ø±Ù‚Ù… 112/2011

### Key Definitions (Article 1 - Ø§Ù„Ù…Ø§Ø¯Ø© 1)

**ÙˆØ­Ø¯Ø§Øª Ø§Ù„Ø¬Ù‡Ø§Ø² Ø§Ù„Ø¥Ø¯Ø§Ø±ÙŠ Ù„Ù„Ø¯ÙˆÙ„Ø© (State Administrative Units):**
- Council of Ministers (Ù…Ø¬Ù„Ø³ Ø§Ù„ÙˆØ²Ø±Ø§Ø¡)
- Ministries and their subordinate administrative and technical bodies (Ø§Ù„ÙˆØ²Ø§Ø±Ø§Øª ÙˆÙ…Ø§ ÙŠØªØ¨Ø¹Ù‡Ø§)
- Specialized councils (Ø§Ù„Ù…Ø¬Ø§Ù„Ø³ Ø§Ù„Ù…ØªØ®ØµØµØ©)
- Public institutions and bodies (Ø§Ù„Ù‡ÙŠØ¦Ø§Øª ÙˆØ§Ù„Ù…Ø¤Ø³Ø³Ø§Øª Ø§Ù„Ø¹Ø§Ù…Ø©)
- Any administrative unit deriving authority from the State (Ø£ÙŠ ÙˆØ­Ø¯Ø© Ø¥Ø¯Ø§Ø±ÙŠØ© ØªØ³ØªÙ…Ø¯ Ø³Ù„Ø·Ø§ØªÙ‡Ø§ Ù…Ù† Ø§Ù„Ø¯ÙˆÙ„Ø©)

**Ø§Ù„Ù…Ø§Ù„ Ø§Ù„Ø¹Ø§Ù… (Public Funds):**
- All real estate or movable property owned publicly or privately by the State
- Property of any State unit
- Companies where government holds more than 40% (Ø§Ù„Ø´Ø±ÙƒØ§Øª Ø§Ù„ØªÙŠ ØªØ³Ø§Ù‡Ù… ÙÙŠÙ‡Ø§ Ø§Ù„Ø­ÙƒÙˆÙ…Ø© Ø¨Ù†Ø³Ø¨Ø© ØªØ²ÙŠØ¯ Ø¹Ù„Ù‰ 40%)
- Private funds managed/supervised by those units (Waqf, Zakat, orphan funds, palaces)

**Ø§Ù„Ù…Ø³Ø¤ÙˆÙ„ Ø§Ù„Ø­ÙƒÙˆÙ…ÙŠ (Government Official):**
- Any person holding a government position (permanent or temporary)
- Members of the State Administrative Council (with or without compensation)
- Government representatives in companies
- Employees of companies where government owns 40%+ of capital

**Ø§Ù„Ù…Ù†ÙØ¹Ø© (Benefit):**
- Any compensation received by a government official (direct or indirect)

---

## Core Prohibitions

### Article 4 - Ø§Ù„Ù…Ø§Ø¯Ø© 4: Protection of Public Funds
- Public funds are **inviolable** (Ù„Ù„Ø£Ù…ÙˆØ§Ù„ Ø§Ù„Ø¹Ø§Ù…Ø© Ø­Ø±Ù…ØªÙ‡Ø§)
- Must be preserved (ÙŠØ¬Ø¨ Ø§Ù„Ù…Ø­Ø§ÙØ¸Ø© Ø¹Ù„ÙŠÙ‡Ø§)
- No disposal except according to law
- No seizure or infringement
- Cannot be acquired or gain any rights through prescription
- Any infringement is **void** and must be removed administratively

### Article 5 - Ø§Ù„Ù…Ø§Ø¯Ø© 5: Duty to Report
Government officials **MUST**:
- Prevent misuse of public funds (ÙŠØ­ÙˆÙ„ Ø¯ÙˆÙ† Ø¥Ø³Ø§Ø¡Ø© Ø§Ø³ØªØ¹Ù…Ø§Ù„ Ø§Ù„Ù…Ø§Ù„ Ø§Ù„Ø¹Ø§Ù…)
- **Immediately report** any violations related to public funds (ÙŠØ¨Ù„Øº Ø§Ù„Ø¬Ù‡Ø§Øª Ø§Ù„Ù…Ø®ØªØµØ© ÙÙˆØ±Ø§Ù‹)

### Article 6 - Ø§Ù„Ù…Ø§Ø¯Ø© 6: Conflict of Interest - Supervision
Government officials **CANNOT** deal with any company or institution in which they have an interest (direct or indirect) if that entity is under their supervision.

### Article 7 - Ø§Ù„Ù…Ø§Ø¯Ø© 7: Abuse of Position
**PROHIBITED:**
- Using position or work to achieve personal benefit or benefit for others
- Exploiting influence to facilitate others obtaining benefits
- Preferential treatment
- Any action that harms public funds or wastes them

### Article 8 - Ø§Ù„Ù…Ø§Ø¯Ø© 8: Acting as Agent/Representative
**PROHIBITED:**
- Acting as agent, representative, or guarantor for any company/institution connected to their work
- Mediation activities to help companies obtain government approval

### Article 9 - Ø§Ù„Ù…Ø§Ø¯Ø© 9: Personal Use of Public Funds
**PROHIBITED:**
- Using public funds for personal purposes or purposes other than designated

### Article 10 - Ø§Ù„Ù…Ø§Ø¯Ø© 10: Private Sector Work
**PROHIBITED:**
- Combining government position with private sector work (permanent or temporary)
- Exception: With proper authorization

### Article 11 - Ø§Ù„Ù…Ø§Ø¯Ø© 11: Ownership Stakes
**PROHIBITED:**
- Government officials (or their minor children) holding shares in companies connected to their work
- Exception: Shares acquired before this law took effect

### Article 12 - Ø§Ù„Ù…Ø§Ø¯Ø© 12: Financial Disclosure
Government officials **MUST** submit annual financial disclosure to OSAI including:
- All movable and immovable assets owned by them, spouse, and minor children
- Source of these assets
- Declarations are **confidential** - only accessible with OSAI President's approval

### Article 13 - Ø§Ù„Ù…Ø§Ø¯Ø© 13: Confidentiality
Government officials **MUST NOT** disclose secrets learned through their position, even after leaving office.

---

## Penalties (Ø§Ù„Ø¹Ù‚ÙˆØ¨Ø§Øª)

| Article | Violation | Penalty |
|---------|-----------|---------|
| **Article 14** | Crimes specified in this law | Penalties in Omani Penal Code or other laws |
| **Article 15** | Violating Articles 4, 5, 8, 9, 10, 12 | **6 months to 2 years imprisonment** |
| **Article 16** | Violating Article 7 (Abuse of position) | **1 to 3 years imprisonment** |
| **Article 17** | Violating Article 11 (Ownership stakes) | **3 months to 1 year imprisonment** |
| **Article 18** | Violating Articles 15, 16, 17 | **Dismissal from position** + **Confiscation of all funds** received in violation |

---

## Violation Categories for Ruzn Classification

Based on this law, complaints can be classified into:

| Category | Arabic | Legal Basis | Severity |
|----------|--------|-------------|----------|
| Misuse of Public Funds | Ø¥Ø³Ø§Ø¡Ø© Ø§Ø³ØªØ¹Ù…Ø§Ù„ Ø§Ù„Ù…Ø§Ù„ Ø§Ù„Ø¹Ø§Ù… | Article 4, 9 | HIGH |
| Conflict of Interest | ØªØ¶Ø§Ø±Ø¨ Ø§Ù„Ù…ØµØ§Ù„Ø­ | Article 6, 11 | HIGH |
| Abuse of Position | Ø§Ø³ØªØºÙ„Ø§Ù„ Ø§Ù„Ù…Ù†ØµØ¨ | Article 7 | HIGH |
| Failure to Report | Ø¹Ø¯Ù… Ø§Ù„Ø¥Ø¨Ù„Ø§Øº Ø¹Ù† Ù…Ø®Ø§Ù„ÙØ§Øª | Article 5 | MEDIUM |
| Unauthorized Private Work | Ø§Ù„Ø¹Ù…Ù„ Ø¨Ø§Ù„Ù‚Ø·Ø§Ø¹ Ø§Ù„Ø®Ø§Øµ Ø¯ÙˆÙ† ØªØ±Ø®ÙŠØµ | Article 10 | MEDIUM |
| Acting as Agent/Mediator | Ø§Ù„ÙˆØ³Ø§Ø·Ø© Ø§Ù„Ù…Ø­Ø¸ÙˆØ±Ø© | Article 8 | HIGH |
| Disclosure Violation | Ù…Ø®Ø§Ù„ÙØ© Ø§Ù„Ø¥ÙØµØ§Ø­ Ø§Ù„Ù…Ø§Ù„ÙŠ | Article 12 | MEDIUM |
| Breach of Confidentiality | Ø¥ÙØ´Ø§Ø¡ Ø§Ù„Ø£Ø³Ø±Ø§Ø± | Article 13 | HIGH |

---

## Risk Scoring Enhancement

| Risk Level | Criteria | Legal Reference | Penalty Range |
|------------|----------|-----------------|---------------|
| **Critical (90-100)** | Embezzlement, theft of public funds | Article 4, 9, 18 | Dismissal + Confiscation |
| **High (70-89)** | Abuse of position for personal gain | Article 7, 16 | 1-3 years imprisonment |
| **High (70-89)** | Conflict of interest | Article 6, 11 | 3 months - 1 year |
| **Medium (40-69)** | Failure to report violations | Article 5, 15 | 6 months - 2 years |
| **Medium (40-69)** | Unauthorized private work | Article 10, 15 | 6 months - 2 years |
| **Low (20-39)** | Minor procedural violations | Various | Administrative action |

# State Audit Law - Royal Decree 111/2011
## Ù‚Ø§Ù†ÙˆÙ† Ø§Ù„Ø±Ù‚Ø§Ø¨Ø© Ø§Ù„Ù…Ø§Ù„ÙŠØ© ÙˆØ§Ù„Ø¥Ø¯Ø§Ø±ÙŠØ© Ù„Ù„Ø¯ÙˆÙ„Ø© - Ø§Ù„Ù…Ø±Ø³ÙˆÙ… Ø§Ù„Ø³Ù„Ø·Ø§Ù†ÙŠ Ø±Ù‚Ù… 111/2011

### Key Definitions (Article 1 - Ø§Ù„Ù…Ø§Ø¯Ø© 1)
1. **Ø§Ù„Ø¬Ù‡Ø§Ø²** (The Institution): Ø¬Ù‡Ø§Ø² Ø§Ù„Ø±Ù‚Ø§Ø¨Ø© Ø§Ù„Ù…Ø§Ù„ÙŠØ© ÙˆØ§Ù„Ø¥Ø¯Ø§Ø±ÙŠØ© Ù„Ù„Ø¯ÙˆÙ„Ø© - State Audit Institution
2. **Ø§Ù„Ø±Ø¦ÙŠØ³** (The President): Ø±Ø¦ÙŠØ³ Ø§Ù„Ø¬Ù‡Ø§Ø² - President of the Institution
3. **Ù†Ø§Ø¦Ø¨ Ø§Ù„Ø±Ø¦ÙŠØ³** (Vice President): Ù†Ø§Ø¦Ø¨ Ø§Ù„Ø±Ø¦ÙŠØ³ Ù„Ù„Ø±Ù‚Ø§Ø¨Ø© Ø§Ù„Ù…Ø§Ù„ÙŠØ© ÙˆØ§Ù„Ø¥Ø¯Ø§Ø±ÙŠØ© Ø¹Ù„Ù‰ Ø§Ù„Ù‡ÙŠØ¦Ø§Øª ÙˆØ§Ù„Ù…Ø¤Ø³Ø³Ø§Øª Ø§Ù„Ø¹Ø§Ù…Ø© ÙˆØ§Ù„Ø´Ø±ÙƒØ§Øª
4. **Ø§Ù„Ù„Ø§Ø¦Ø­Ø©** (Regulations): Ø§Ù„Ù„Ø§Ø¦Ø­Ø© Ø§Ù„ØªÙ†ÙÙŠØ°ÙŠØ© Ù„Ù‚Ø§Ù†ÙˆÙ† Ø§Ù„Ø±Ù‚Ø§Ø¨Ø© Ø§Ù„Ù…Ø§Ù„ÙŠØ© ÙˆØ§Ù„Ø¥Ø¯Ø§Ø±ÙŠØ© Ù„Ù„Ø¯ÙˆÙ„Ø©
5. **Ø§Ù„Ø£Ø¹Ø¶Ø§Ø¡** (Members): Ø§Ù„Ù…ÙˆØ¸ÙÙˆÙ† Ø§Ù„Ø±Ù‚Ø§Ø¨ÙŠÙˆÙ† Ø¨Ø§Ù„Ø¬Ù‡Ø§Ø²
6. **Ø§Ù„Ù…ÙˆØ¸ÙÙˆÙ†** (Employees): Ø§Ù„Ù…ÙˆØ¸ÙÙˆÙ† Ø§Ù„ÙÙ†ÙŠÙˆÙ† ÙˆØ§Ù„Ø¥Ø¯Ø§Ø±ÙŠÙˆÙ† Ø¨Ø§Ù„Ø¬Ù‡Ø§Ø²
7. **Ù…Ø±Ø§Ù‚Ø¨Ùˆ Ø§Ù„Ø­Ø³Ø§Ø¨Ø§Øª** (Auditors): Ø§Ù„Ù…Ø±Ø§Ø¬Ø¹ÙˆÙ† ÙˆØ§Ù„Ù…Ø­Ø§Ø³Ø¨ÙˆÙ† Ø§Ù„Ø°ÙŠÙ† ÙŠØ²Ø§ÙˆÙ„ÙˆÙ† Ø§Ù„Ù…Ù‡Ù†Ø© ÙˆÙÙ‚Ø§Ù‹ Ù„Ù‚Ø§Ù†ÙˆÙ† ØªÙ†Ø¸ÙŠÙ… Ù…Ø²Ø§ÙˆÙ„Ø© Ù…Ù‡Ù†Ø© Ø§Ù„Ù…Ø­Ø§Ø³Ø¨Ø© ÙˆØ§Ù„Ù…Ø±Ø§Ø¬Ø¹Ø© Ø¨Ø§Ù„Ø³Ù„Ø·Ù†Ø©

### Legal Status (Article 2 - Ø§Ù„Ù…Ø§Ø¯Ø© 2)
- The Institution has **legal personality** (Ø§Ù„Ø´Ø®ØµÙŠØ© Ø§Ù„Ø§Ø¹ØªØ¨Ø§Ø±ÙŠØ©)
- **Financial and administrative independence** (Ø§Ù„Ø§Ø³ØªÙ‚Ù„Ø§Ù„ Ø§Ù„Ù…Ø§Ù„ÙŠ ÙˆØ§Ù„Ø¥Ø¯Ø§Ø±ÙŠ)
- Reports directly to His Majesty the Sultan (ÙŠØªØ¨Ø¹ Ø¬Ù„Ø§Ù„Ø© Ø§Ù„Ø³Ù„Ø·Ø§Ù† Ù…Ø¨Ø§Ø´Ø±Ø©)

### Budget Independence (Article 3 - Ø§Ù„Ù…Ø§Ø¯Ø© 3)
- Independent budget as a single item in the State General Budget
- Non-deductible expenditures
- President approves the budget draft
- Institution alone audits its own accounts

### Scope of Oversight (Article 4 - Ø§Ù„Ù…Ø§Ø¯Ø© 4)
The Institution oversees financial and administrative control of:
- State-owned funds
- Entities subject to its oversight
- Following up on entity performance
- All financial and administrative transactions

### Entity Obligations (Article 5 - Ø§Ù„Ù…Ø§Ø¯Ø© 5)
Entities subject to oversight must provide the Institution with:
- Draft laws and regulations
- Financial, accounting, tax, and fee-related matters
- Any observations requested

### Headquarters (Article 6 - Ø§Ù„Ù…Ø§Ø¯Ø© 6)
- Main headquarters: Muscat Governorate (Ù…Ø­Ø§ÙØ¸Ø© Ù…Ø³Ù‚Ø·)
- President may establish branches in other governorates

### Judicial Authority (Article 7 - Ø§Ù„Ù…Ø§Ø¯Ø© 7)
Institution members have **judicial police authority** (ØµÙØ© Ø§Ù„Ø¶Ø¨Ø·ÙŠØ© Ø§Ù„Ù‚Ø¶Ø§Ø¦ÙŠØ©) in applying this law

---

## Chapter 2: Institution Objectives (Ø§Ù„ÙØµÙ„ Ø§Ù„Ø«Ø§Ù†ÙŠ: Ø£Ù‡Ø¯Ø§Ù Ø§Ù„Ø¬Ù‡Ø§Ø²)

### Article 8 - Ø§Ù„Ù…Ø§Ø¯Ø© 8: Core Objectives
1. **Protection of public funds** (Ø­Ù…Ø§ÙŠØ© Ø§Ù„Ø£Ù…ÙˆØ§Ù„ Ø§Ù„Ø¹Ø§Ù…Ø© Ù„Ù„Ø¯ÙˆÙ„Ø©) and private funds managed by or supervised by entities
2. **Verification of compliance** with laws, regulations, systems, and organizational decisions
3. **Avoidance of conflicts of interest** (ØªØ¬Ù†Ø¨ ÙˆÙ‚ÙˆØ¹ ØªØ¶Ø§Ø±Ø¨ Ø§Ù„Ù…ØµØ§Ù„Ø­) and financial/administrative violations
4. **Identifying deficiencies** in laws, regulations, and financial/administrative systems
5. **Commitment to transparency** (Ø§Ù„Ø§Ù„ØªØ²Ø§Ù… Ø¨Ù…Ø¨Ø¯Ø£ Ø§Ù„Ø´ÙØ§ÙÙŠØ©) in financial and administrative transactions
6. **Preventive oversight** (Ø§Ù„Ø±Ù‚Ø§Ø¨Ø© Ø§Ù„ÙˆÙ‚Ø§Ø¦ÙŠØ©) and ensuring proper workflow
7. **Performance evaluation** of entities economically, efficiently, and effectively
8. **Uncovering causes of deficiencies** in performance and production, and determining responsibility

---

## Chapter 3: Institution Competencies (Ø§Ù„ÙØµÙ„ Ø§Ù„Ø«Ø§Ù„Ø«: Ø§Ø®ØªØµØ§ØµØ§Øª Ø§Ù„Ø¬Ù‡Ø§Ø²)

### Article 9 - Ø§Ù„Ù…Ø§Ø¯Ø© 9: Areas of Oversight
1. **Financial oversight** (Ø§Ù„Ø±Ù‚Ø§Ø¨Ø© Ø§Ù„Ù…Ø§Ù„ÙŠØ©) - accounting and legal aspects
2. **Administrative oversight** (Ø§Ù„Ø±Ù‚Ø§Ø¨Ø© Ø§Ù„Ø¥Ø¯Ø§Ø±ÙŠØ©)
3. **Performance oversight** (Ø±Ù‚Ø§Ø¨Ø© Ø§Ù„Ø£Ø¯Ø§Ø¡)
4. **Oversight of decisions** regarding financial violations
5. **Oversight of investments** and all accounts of entities subject to oversight
6. **Any other tasks** assigned by His Majesty the Sultan

### Article 10 - Ø§Ù„Ù…Ø§Ø¯Ø© 10: Exercise of Competencies
1. Review asset valuation reports for privatization and draft agreements
2. Review revenues, expenditures, disbursement documents, and collection records
3. Verify financial transactions and accounting constraints
4. Verify settlements are supported by official documents

---

## Violation Categories for Ruzn Classification

Based on this law, complaints can be classified into:

| Category | Arabic | Legal Basis |
|----------|--------|-------------|
| Financial Corruption | ÙØ³Ø§Ø¯ Ù…Ø§Ù„ÙŠ | Articles 8(1), 9(1), 10 |
| Conflict of Interest | ØªØ¶Ø§Ø±Ø¨ Ø§Ù„Ù…ØµØ§Ù„Ø­ | Article 8(3) |
| Administrative Negligence | Ø¥Ù‡Ù…Ø§Ù„ Ø¥Ø¯Ø§Ø±ÙŠ | Articles 8(7), 8(8), 9(2) |
| Tender/Procurement Violation | Ù…Ø®Ø§Ù„ÙØ© Ù‚Ø§Ù†ÙˆÙ† Ø§Ù„Ù…Ù†Ø§Ù‚ØµØ§Øª | Articles 9(4), 10(1) |
| Abuse of Power | Ø¥Ø³Ø§Ø¡Ø© Ø§Ø³ØªØ®Ø¯Ø§Ù… Ø§Ù„Ø³Ù„Ø·Ø© | Articles 8(2), 9(3) |
| Transparency Violation | Ù…Ø®Ø§Ù„ÙØ© Ø§Ù„Ø´ÙØ§ÙÙŠØ© | Article 8(5) |

---

## Risk Scoring Legal Basis

| Risk Level | Criteria | Legal Reference |
|------------|----------|-----------------|
| High (70-100) | Public funds misuse, fraud, embezzlement | Article 8(1) - Ø­Ù…Ø§ÙŠØ© Ø§Ù„Ø£Ù…ÙˆØ§Ù„ Ø§Ù„Ø¹Ø§Ù…Ø© |
| High (70-100) | Conflict of interest | Article 8(3) - ØªØ¶Ø§Ø±Ø¨ Ø§Ù„Ù…ØµØ§Ù„Ø­ |
| Medium (40-69) | Administrative negligence | Article 8(7), 8(8) |
| Medium (40-69) | Procurement irregularities | Article 9(4), 10(1) |
| Low (0-39) | Minor procedural issues | Article 8(5) - Ø§Ù„Ø´ÙØ§ÙÙŠØ© |

diff --git a/esm/index.js b/esm/index.js
index c83bc63a2c10431fb62e25b7d490656a3796f301..bcae513cc20a4be6c38dc116e0b8d9bacda62b5b 100644
--- a/esm/index.js
+++ b/esm/index.js
@@ -338,6 +338,23 @@ const Switch = ({ children, location }) => {
   const router = useRouter();
   const [originalLocation] = useLocationFromRouter(router);
 
+  // Collect all route paths to window object
+  if (typeof window !== 'undefined') {
+    if (!window.__WOUTER_ROUTES__) {
+      window.__WOUTER_ROUTES__ = [];
+    }
+
+    const allChildren = flattenChildren(children);
+    allChildren.forEach((element) => {
+      if (isValidElement(element) && element.props.path) {
+        const path = element.props.path;
+        if (!window.__WOUTER_ROUTES__.includes(path)) {
+          window.__WOUTER_ROUTES__.push(path);
+        }
+      }
+    });
+  }
+
   for (const element of flattenChildren(children)) {
     let match = 0;

import { seedHistoricalData } from './server/db.ts';

async function main() {
  console.log('Seeding historical data...');
  const result = await seedHistoricalData();
  console.log('Result:', JSON.stringify(result, null, 2));
  process.exit(0);
}

main().catch(err => {
  console.error('Error:', err);
  process.exit(1);
});


================================================================================
FILE: server/_core/context.ts
================================================================================

import type { CreateExpressContextOptions } from "@trpc/server/adapters/express";
import type { User } from "../../drizzle/schema";
import { sdk } from "./sdk";

export type TrpcContext = {
  req: CreateExpressContextOptions["req"];
  res: CreateExpressContextOptions["res"];
  user: User | null;
};

export async function createContext(
  opts: CreateExpressContextOptions
): Promise<TrpcContext> {
  let user: User | null = null;

  try {
    user = await sdk.authenticateRequest(opts.req);
  } catch (error) {
    // Authentication is optional for public procedures.
    user = null;
  }

  return {
    req: opts.req,
    res: opts.res,
    user,
  };
}


================================================================================
FILE: server/_core/cookies.ts
================================================================================

import type { CookieOptions, Request } from "express";

const LOCAL_HOSTS = new Set(["localhost", "127.0.0.1", "::1"]);

function isIpAddress(host: string) {
  // Basic IPv4 check and IPv6 presence detection.
  if (/^\d{1,3}(\.\d{1,3}){3}$/.test(host)) return true;
  return host.includes(":");
}

function isSecureRequest(req: Request) {
  if (req.protocol === "https") return true;

  const forwardedProto = req.headers["x-forwarded-proto"];
  if (!forwardedProto) return false;

  const protoList = Array.isArray(forwardedProto)
    ? forwardedProto
    : forwardedProto.split(",");

  return protoList.some(proto => proto.trim().toLowerCase() === "https");
}

export function getSessionCookieOptions(
  req: Request
): Pick<CookieOptions, "domain" | "httpOnly" | "path" | "sameSite" | "secure"> {
  // const hostname = req.hostname;
  // const shouldSetDomain =
  //   hostname &&
  //   !LOCAL_HOSTS.has(hostname) &&
  //   !isIpAddress(hostname) &&
  //   hostname !== "127.0.0.1" &&
  //   hostname !== "::1";

  // const domain =
  //   shouldSetDomain && !hostname.startsWith(".")
  //     ? `.${hostname}`
  //     : shouldSetDomain
  //       ? hostname
  //       : undefined;

  return {
    httpOnly: true,
    path: "/",
    sameSite: "none",
    secure: isSecureRequest(req),
  };
}


================================================================================
FILE: server/_core/dataApi.ts
================================================================================

/**
 * Quick example (matches curl usage):
 *   await callDataApi("Youtube/search", {
 *     query: { gl: "US", hl: "en", q: "manus" },
 *   })
 */
import { ENV } from "./env";

export type DataApiCallOptions = {
  query?: Record<string, unknown>;
  body?: Record<string, unknown>;
  pathParams?: Record<string, unknown>;
  formData?: Record<string, unknown>;
};

export async function callDataApi(
  apiId: string,
  options: DataApiCallOptions = {}
): Promise<unknown> {
  if (!ENV.forgeApiUrl) {
    throw new Error("BUILT_IN_FORGE_API_URL is not configured");
  }
  if (!ENV.forgeApiKey) {
    throw new Error("BUILT_IN_FORGE_API_KEY is not configured");
  }

  // Build the full URL by appending the service path to the base URL
  const baseUrl = ENV.forgeApiUrl.endsWith("/") ? ENV.forgeApiUrl : `${ENV.forgeApiUrl}/`;
  const fullUrl = new URL("webdevtoken.v1.WebDevService/CallApi", baseUrl).toString();

  const response = await fetch(fullUrl, {
    method: "POST",
    headers: {
      accept: "application/json",
      "content-type": "application/json",
      "connect-protocol-version": "1",
      authorization: `Bearer ${ENV.forgeApiKey}`,
    },
    body: JSON.stringify({
      apiId,
      query: options.query,
      body: options.body,
      path_params: options.pathParams,
      multipart_form_data: options.formData,
    }),
  });

  if (!response.ok) {
    const detail = await response.text().catch(() => "");
    throw new Error(
      `Data API request failed (${response.status} ${response.statusText})${detail ? `: ${detail}` : ""}`
    );
  }

  const payload = await response.json().catch(() => ({}));
  if (payload && typeof payload === "object" && "jsonData" in payload) {
    try {
      return JSON.parse((payload as Record<string, string>).jsonData ?? "{}");
    } catch {
      return (payload as Record<string, unknown>).jsonData;
    }
  }
  return payload;
}


================================================================================
FILE: server/_core/env.ts
